reference.title: Mapgroup domain elements
reference.shortdesc: The mapgroup domain elements define, group, or reference content. Many of the mapgroup elements are convenience elements; they simply provide shortcuts for an author to use existing markup

section.p: For example, the topichead element allows a map to specify a heading without a reference to a topic. While a topicref element might accomplish the same thing by creating a title and leaving off the href attribute, the topichead element makes the intent clearer and prevents the accidental inclusion of an href attribute.
